contentfulProduct.seoDescription: These high-waisted, utility-inspired cargo pants combine comfort & function. Soft cotton twill with a bit of stretch for extra comfort, plus side welt and cargo patch pockets with a flap and button closure.
contentfulProduct.title: Stretch Cotton Twill Cargo Pant

content.value: These high-waisted, utility-inspired cargo pants combine comfort & function. Soft cotton twill with a bit of stretch for extra comfort, plus side welt and cargo patch pockets with a flap and button closure.
Material: 98% BCI Cotton / 2% Spandex

The Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) aims to improve global cotton production by training farmers across the world on more sustainable farming practices including efficient water use, care for soil health, and reducing use of harmful chemicals.
Produced in factories certified by SMETA (Sedex Members Ethical Trade Audits) which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain.
High rise fit
Inseam: 28"
Cargo pockets with button flap
Origin: Shenzhen, China
Model is 5'9" and wearing a size 29
Machine wash cold. Gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Cool iron or dry clean if needed.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 98% BCI Cotton / 2% Spandex
  • The Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) aims to improve global cotton production by training farmers across the world on more sustainable farming practices including efficient water use, care for soil health, and reducing use of harmful chemicals.
  • Produced in factories certified by SMETA (Sedex Members Ethical Trade Audits) which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain.
  • High rise fit
  • Inseam: 28"
  • Cargo pockets with button flap
  • Origin: Shenzhen, China
  • Model is 5'9" and wearing a size 29

productDescription.productDescription: These high-waisted, utility-inspired cargo pants combine comfort & function. Soft cotton twill with a bit of stretch for extra comfort, plus side welt and cargo patch pockets with a flap and button closure.

content.value: "Quinces new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality youre getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! Its now a reality  in 10 colors  thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to selldirectto the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like Im Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
